Title: Hot Tub Time Machine 2
Writer: Josh Heald, Josh Heald (characters), John Karnay (additional screenwriting)
Actors: Rob Corddry, Craig Robinson, Clark Duke, Adam Scott
Plot: When Lou's shot in the groin, Nick and Jacob drag him in the Hot Tub Time Machine to go back in time and save Lou. The three end up 10 years in the future, where they need to go to find the shooter.
